item.description: Stowe Mountain Rescue in Vermont has noticed a troubling trend among skiers

item.title: World must jointly tackle issues of climate change, pollution, UN says
item.description: The United Nations says the world needs a new way of thinking about environmental crises threatening the health of people and the planet

item.title: Man who says religious group beat him wants prosecutor removed after long wait for retrial
item.description: A man who says he was held down and beaten by members of a religious group in North Carolina wants the prosecutor removed from his case
